Description: Name of the white dwarf component, of the form WD XXXX+/-XXX
A Simbad-resolvable name for the main sequence star component
Type of discovery: img: discovered in imaging; phot: discovered through photometric colors; astr: discovered via astrometry; spec: discovered spectroscopically
Notes for things such as: included in the Holberg2013 sample
Have the two components been resolved in imaging?
Have the two componenets been confirmed as bound?
Number of known stellar components in the system. If more than two, use the primary star as the MS component for above and below info
Position angle east of north for WD relative to MS
Does the WD have a dynamical mass estimate
uncertainty on WD age plus value
uncertainty on WD age minus value
uncertainty on MS age plus value
uncertainty on MS age minus value
Is the WD known to be polluted? Y = yes, N = no, U = has not been observed for pollution
If orbit of WD+MS is known: semi-major axis
Time of Periastron Passage in decimal year
Type of distribution described by uncertanties on parameters. Ex: 68% CI, Gaussian
